content: blo in next st skip next st x 2 3 double_crochet in next st the top of the treble_crochet skip next st the top of the petal skip next chain space repeat from beginning all around 14 double_crochet 14 double_crochet blo 2 single_crochet 1 x chain-2 per side - 12 - any or all of the following three rounds can be worked in double_crochet or half_double_crochet to achieve the correct size if you choose half_double_crochet for r14 the corners should be worked in double_crochet r14 2 treble_crochet chain 2 2 treble_crochet in corner chain space skip first hidden stitch double_crochet in next 14 st double_crochet in next st catching in back bump third loop of st in r12 immediately below the centre fphdc double_crochet in next 14 st repeat from beginning all around 4 treble_crochet 29 double_crochet 1 x chain-2 per side r15 3 double_crochet chain 2 3 double_crochet in corner chain space skip first 2 st including hidden st double_crochet in next 13 st skip next st 3 double_crochet in next st the centre st skip next st double_crochet in next 14 st skip last st repeat from beginning all around 36 double_crochet 1 x chain-2 per side - 13 - r16 3 double_crochet chain 2 3 double_crochet in corner chain space skip next 2 st double_crochet in next 33 st skip last st repeat from beginning all around 39 double_crochet 1 x chain-2 per side 41 st per side including turning chain finished 🎉 🎉 - 14 - design copyright notice please do not share this pattern in any form online by email or in print you are welcome to make any changes and to use finished items in any way you like but if displayed online or offered for sale please include an acknowledgement and/or link to the original pattern page on ravelry please do not claim it as your own design thank you 😁 catwhiskerscrochet@gmail com © christine bateman 2024
